description: "Once is a fluke, twice is a coincidence." We are back again for Episode 2! This week, Chris and Ethan reminisce on the songs that made them lifelong fans of the genre, and share some of the memories associated with those songs. We want to hear what songs drew you in as 'grunge' rock fans! Reach out and let us know! Support the podcast directly by becoming a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/grunge_bible​
html_description:
"Once is a fluke, twice is a coincidence." We are back again for Episode 2! This week, Chris and Ethan reminisce on the songs that made them lifelong fans of the genre, and share some of the memories associated with those songs. We want to hear what songs drew you in as 'grunge' rock fans! Reach out and let us know!


Support the podcast directly by becoming a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/grunge_bible​
name: Episode 2: The Songs That Made Us Fans

show.description: Join Chris Celona and Ethan Shalaway as they discuss all things music and 90s ‘grunge‘ rock, with discussions of stories, albums, lyrics, artists, as well as interviews, questions, and answers.  Produced by Drew McFadyen.
show.html_description:
Join Chris Celona and Ethan Shalaway as they discuss all things music and 90s ‘grunge‘ rock, with discussions of stories, albums, lyrics, artists, as well as interviews, questions, and answers.
Produced by Drew McFadyen.
show.name: The Grunge Bible Podcast
